paper_abstract: Dynamics of the formation of self-assembled sub-monolayer networks of colloidal nanoparticles is studied in the two-dimensional lattice gas model by Monte Carlo simulation The site-percolation threshold (p(c)) is studied for various temperatures and chemical potentials Our numerical results show that p(c) is greatly reduced due to the evaporation-driving self-organization The results are qualitatively consistent with our experimental observation (C) 2010 Elsevier BV All rights reserved
paper_title: Temporal dynamics of site percolation in nanoparticle assemblies
